workflow.name: Automated lead follow-up with Follow Up Boss, Gmail, Twilio & WhatsApp messaging
workflow.description:
This workflow automates your entire lead follow-up process across email, SMS, and WhatsApp.

It starts on a schedule and pulls your latest leads from FollowUpBoss (FUB), checking when the workflow last ran. Each new contact is automatically validated ‚Äî phone numbers and emails are cleaned, filtered, and checked for duplicates before sending any message.

Once validated, the system intelligently decides how to reach each lead:

üí¨ Email + SMS if all data looks good

üìß Email only if phone is invalid

üì± SMS/WhatsApp only if email is missing

Each message is personalized using data from the lead record, and everything is tracked back in your database for future reporting.

This template helps agents, marketing teams, and CRM users run consistent follow-ups without missing a single contact. Whether you manage 10 or 10 000 leads, this flow scales effortlessly.

Tools used: FollowUpBoss, Gmail, Twilio/WhatsApp, n8n

(Tip: Replace your API keys and Gmail credentials before running.)![Captura de pantalla 20251015 202825.png](fileId:2967)

workflow.name: Automated Lead Follow-Up System ‚Äì Validate, Email & Message New Leads from Follow Up Boss

nodes.name: Full data ‚Üí Send both Email + SMS/WhatsApp

parameters.content:
# üü® STEP 3: Smart Follow-Up Logic

# n8n branches into three paths:

## Full data ‚Üí Send both Email + SMS/WhatsApp

## Missing phone ‚Üí Email only

## Missing email ‚Üí SMS/WhatsApp only

# üüß STEP 4: Personalized Messages & Logging

## Personalized emails and texts are sent automatically, and the workflow records the latest run timestamp to keep the system synced for next time.

# üü¶ STEP 2: Validation & Filtering

## Each lead is checked for valid email and phone. Invalid or duplicate entries are filtered out to avoid wasted messages or bounces.

# üü© STEP 1: Scheduled Trigger & Lead Fetch

## The flow runs automatically on a schedule, retrieves the latest leads from FollowUpBoss, and loads only new entries since the last run.

# This workflow automates your entire lead follow-up process across email, SMS, and WhatsApp.

## It starts on a schedule and pulls your latest leads from FollowUpBoss (FUB), checking when the workflow last ran. Each new contact is automatically validated ‚Äî phone numbers and emails are cleaned, filtered, and checked for duplicates before sending any message.

Once validated, the system intelligently decides how to reach each lead:

üí¨ Email + SMS if all data looks good

üìß Email only if phone is invalid

üì± SMS/WhatsApp only if email is missing

Each message is personalized using data from the lead record, and everything is tracked back in your database for future reporting.

This template helps agents, marketing teams, and CRM users run consistent follow-ups without missing a single contact. Whether you manage 10 or 10 000 leads, this flow scales effortlessly.

Tools used: FollowUpBoss, Gmail, Twilio/WhatsApp, n8n

(Tip: Replace your API keys and Gmail credentials before running.)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
